name: SportsCubed
body:
# Team Will Code for Food
##SportsCubed
Made for the [Smart Data Hackathon](http://data.inf.ed.ac.uk/ilwhack/finalprojects.php). You can try the webpage [here](http://cubed.co.nf/).

## Our project
We took the challenge to improve the way you can search for sport facilities in Edinburgh. Using the data from the [The City of Edinburgh Council](http://www.edinburgh.gov.uk/) we created an interactive 3D map, allowing you to easily search and filter sports by different categories-price, time and activities. After you have selected all options, you can view the results on a map with detailed information about each facility.
## Authors
###Martin Asenov
###Dimitar Dimitrov
###Yordan Hristov
### Boris Penev
###Dimitar Todorov
